summary: Jemma is a werewolf follower that has multiple forms; A flame form, a frost form, an electric form, and a mountable wolf form.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#741b47][u][size=6]JEMMA- A WEREWOLF FOLLOWER[/size] [/u][size=4][i] By: Dragonman999000[/i][/size][/color]
[size=3][color=#000000]Jemma is a werewolf follower that can be found at Whiterun's stable. All you have to do is talk to Jemma and she will follow you. Jemma wont set off traps or affect your stealth meter, and she wont die. Jemma can be morphed into different forms using different salts.She can be turned back into her original form by using Jemma Revert on her while she is in one of her werewolf forms.[/color]
[/size]
[size=4]  ______________________________________________________________________________________________[/size]
[color=#741b47][size=6][u]Jemma's Forms[/u][/size][/color]
[color=#000000][size=4]Electric- [/size][size=3]Jemma can be morphed into an electric daedroth with 5 void salts. In this form she is surrounded by a storm cloak and her attacks are enchanted with shock. She is resistant to shock and can walk on water.

[/size][size=3]Fire- Jemma can be morphed into a flamelurker with 5 fire salts. She has a protective fire cloak and is trailed by flames. Jemma's attacks are enchanted with fire, she is resistant to fire but weak to ice. She can walk on water.

[/size][size=3]Frost-Jemma can be morphed into an ancient frostlurker with 5 frost salts.In this form she has a frost cloak and is resistant to ice. She has a weakness to fire but her attacks are enchanted with ice. She can breath under water.

[/size][size=3]Wolf- Jemma can be turned into a wolf simply by telling her to. In this form she can be mounted, but cant be talked to and isn't very useful in combat (also I wouldn't recommend trying to swim while mounted).Jemma can be turned back into a werewolf with a spell called Revert Jemma, this spell is added to you the first time you morph her.

[/size][/color]  ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#741b47][size=6][u]Updates[/u][/size]
[/color][size=3][color=#000000]1.1- Replaces Jemma's Dadroth and Lurker form meshes with color variant werewolf meshes. Also makes Jemma's mountable forms correlate to the werewolf forms.
[/color]
[/size] ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=#741b47][size=6][u]Compatibility[/u][/size][/color]
[color=#000000][size=3]Jemma should be compatible with every other mod since she is a standalone follower.[/size][/color]

[size=3] ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/size]
[youtube]1YLo9ABoLwU[/youtube]

 _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[/url]gg77- for armored wolf .nif- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30192/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30192/?

[/url]CyranGE- for suggesting color variation.-[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/24864904/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/24864904/[/url]
author: Dragonman999000
